title: [Neutral]  LinkedIn reserves the right to limit your use of their Services.

tosdr.case: [Neutral]  LinkedIn reserves the right to limit your use of their Services.-neutral-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  LinkedIn reserves the right to limit your use of their Services, including the number of your connections and your ability to contact other Members. They can restrict, suspend, or terminate your account, but this is only if they believe that you have misused the Services (e.g. violating any Do and Don'ts).
